document_data.caption: ''Sylvira unlocking infernal secrets.''
document_data.name: Sylvira Savikas
document_data.mainbody:
'''Sylvira Savikas''' was an [[archmage]], [[sage]], as well as one of the eight Great Readers [[Candlekeep]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. Her laboratory was located within one of the library-fortresses' circular towers.

{{Quote|The artistry and assembly of this device...it's brilliant and horrifying. But I will solve it.|Sylvira, examining an ''[[infernal puzzle box]]''.}}
document_data.Personality: Great Reader Sylvira was extremely knowledgeable about a great many subjects. While she had a wry sense of humor, she was always willing to ready to delve into scholarly pursuits when opportunities arose.
document_data.Abilities:
Sylvira was exceptionally knowledgeable about the various [[planes of existence]], with a specialty in the [[Outer Planes]],  as they appeared within the [[Great Wheel cosmology|Great Wheel]] cosmological model. 

She also possessed a particular expertise related to [[magic]]al [[puzzle box]]es.
document_data.Relationships:
[[File:Shandeir, others.png|thumb|right|250px|Sylvira, [[Shandeir]] and their companions aboard the ''[[Hesperornis]]''.]]
Sylvira had a [[quasit]] [[familiar]] named [[Jezebel]]. She was also an acquaintance of the archmage [[Traxigor]], who lived in a stone tower that floated above the [[Sea of Swords]].
